name: Balanak (Autumn)
description:
Nature of Iran
The name of this modern work is a combination of "Barank" plant and "Balan" carpet. One of beautiful works of art in Arasbaran region is the Balan or Qara Dagh carpet, the best design of which is woven in Balan village. Balan carpet is a type of carpet runner specific to the middle regions of Arasbaran and is close to Tabriz carpet in design.
This work is an experience from my eyes to the forests of "Arasbaran" in autumn.
